attributes.action: Consider weddings when it come to Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Weddings are stressful anyway, there isn’t even just a small group, with main wedding season coming up, We really feel the government need to  start considering and advising about life changing events such as weddings a funerals.
attributes.background: As the government are only giving out advice on what the public should be doing, Brides getting married this year are left in limbo. Being bound by terms and conditions but now not being able to have important family members there.

rejection.details:
Since this petition was started, the Government has announced further measures, including stopping social	events, like weddings, baptisms and other religious ceremonies. We aren't sure what further action you'd like the Government or Parliament to take.  

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:
NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
